Title: Igniting Hope
Description:
One dawntower has fallen, but a faint glimmer of hope remains with the smaller keyflame atop the wall. 

The shattered remnants needed to sustain that light were taken by the nerubians.

Gather the remnants from nerubians you slay, and help ignite a beacon of hope!
ObjectivesText: Gather 5 Shattered Remnants and use them to empower the Aegis keyflame.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Faerin atop the Aegis Wall.
CompletionText: An empowered keyflame will be a great help.
RewardText: With the light of the flame I see hope that we will drive the nerubians back!

Objectives.Text: Aegis Keyflame empowered by Shattered Remnants
